彴字的基本解释

彴
zhuó
独木桥：“野彴渡春水。”
山间溪流中用以渡人的踏脚石。

彴
bó
流星。

彴字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhuó］
［《廣韻》之若切，入藥，章。］
(1)独木桥。
(2)石步，溪流中供渡涉的踏脚石。
[②]［bó］
［《集韻》弼角切，入覺，並。］
见“彴2約”。

彴字的康熙字典解释

【寅集下】【彳字部】　彴； 康熙笔画：6； 页码：页365第06
【廣韻】之若切【集韻】【正韻】職略切，?音勺。【廣雅】獨梁也。【廣韻】橫木渡水也。【蘇軾·游蔣山詩】略彴橫秋水。　又【集韻】亭歷切，音笛。義同。　又【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?弼角切，音雹。【爾雅·釋天】奔星爲彴約。【疏】奔星卽流星。一名彴約。

彴字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
彴字的起名意思

暂无。

彴
Basic explanation of words
彴
zhuó
Single-plank bridge: "Yewei crosses the spring water."
Stepping stones used to ferry people in mountain streams.
彴
bó
meteor.
彴
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhuó］
["Guang Yun" is cut, used as medicine, chapter. ]
(1) Single-plank bridge.
(2) Stone steps, stepping stones used for ferry crossing in the stream.
[②]［bó］
["Ji Yun" but the angle cuts, enters the sense, and merges. ]
See "彴2约".
彴
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Ji 2] [彳字部] 　彴; Kangxi strokes: 6; Page number: page 365 06
[Guang Yun] If cut [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun] slightly cut,? Yin spoon. [Guang Ya] Alone. [Guangyun] Crossing the water across the wood. 【Su Shi·You Jiangshan Poems】Slightly cross the autumn water.　[Jiyun] Pavilion Liqie, sound flute. The same meaning.　 [Ji Yun] [Rhyme] [Zheng Yun]? The corner cut, sound hail. 【Erya·Shitian】Benxing is an appointment. 【Sparse】Ben Xing and Meteor. An appointment.
